data.description:
After almost six years of zero-G competitive action, Ready At Dawn will cease operations of Echo VR on August 1st, 2023 - 10:00 AM Pacific. The time has come for the studio to focus on new projects, which we look forward to sharing in the future. 

It has been our pleasure to see this community grow, compete, and bring so much passion to the game over the years. Thank you. More information: https://medium.com/@EchoGames/an-update-on-the-future-of-echo-vr-7f074dca1ed1

Want to meet and talk to other fans and the developers directly or form your own esports team?  Head to the Echo Games community-run Discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5

Echo VR also features cross-play between Quest and Rift.

Please note that Echo VR requires Oculus runtime version 16 or greater.

changelog.change_log: Version 4987570
Echo Combat patch - requires the Rift client to access.
Various Content and Bug Fixes.
Fix for Crash when joining matches
Various Content and Bug Fixes.
Fix for crash when joining matches
Various Content and Bug Fixes.
Fixed an issue that was causing the Echo Points button to disappear rapidly when around the customization podium

- New Content
- Fixed an issue with lobbies not loading
- Additional content for the Echo Shop

New Features
- Support & Social button
    New button on the main menu that will open our new bug/support ticket and social hub
- Additional content for the Echo Shop

New Features
- VRML S5 tags are finally here
    - We will be working with VRML to get these out over the next week

Bug Fixes
- General fixes to Into the Knight rewards
- Added the ability to preview fanfares from the Echo Shop when available
- Improved error messaging

New Features
- Echo Pass Season 7
- Echo Shop Updates

Bug Fixes
- Announcer VO will now play with the catapult/end of match when a goal is scored within the last 15 seconds
- Addressed an issue with applying no tint on the Flamey chassis
- Fixed an issue with pre-match music persisting throughout a VS. AI match
- Player will no longer soft lock when setting Input grabbing and Release to 50%

- Fixed an exploit that was allowing users to equip customizations they did not own
- Chicago/Dallas server should no longer restart with players connected

New Features
- Support for Meta Accounts
- New Dynamic Music option to highlight key moments of matches
    - This can be toggled on/off in the settings menu
    - Dynamic music applies only in Arena matches

Bug Fixes
- Corrected collision mesh on the Fenrir chassis
- Teams will now correctly appear un-readied when the other team changes the rules in private matches
- Fix to stats calculating incorrectly
fixed an exploit that allowed users to pretend to be someone else
